meanings.sent1: The table had a quadrate top.

meanings.definition: To divide into four equal parts
meanings.sent1: She decided to quadrate the pizza for easy sharing.
meanings.sent2: The chef needed to quadrate the ingredients before cooking.
meanings.sent3: He tried to quadrate his time between work and hobbies.
meanings.sent4: The teacher had to quadrate the class into groups for the project.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle required him to quadrate the image to solve it.

meanings.definition: A square or rectangular shape or object
meanings.sent1: The room was a perfect quadrate.
